Interface MotorController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdafruitMotorShield, Arduino, ArduinoBT, Sabertooth

    public interface MotorController

      This is basic information to request from a Controller.
      boolean motorAttach(java.lang.String motorName, java.lang.Integer pwmPin, java.lang.Integer dirPin)
      Remote attachment activation - used by services not in the same instance to attach a Motor to a MotorController

      MotorDetach - detach the Motor from a specific pin on the controller
      void motorMove(java.lang.String name)
      request for motor to move the motor can be queried for the new powerlevel and the controller shall appropriately change power level and direction if necessary
      void motorMoveTo(java.lang.String name, double position)
      moveTo - move the Motor a relative amount the amount can be negative or positive an integer value is expected
